title: Gaming to re-engage boys in learning
description: In her talk, Ali Carr-Chellman pinpoints three reasons boys are tuning out of school in droves, and lays out her bold plan to re-engage them: bringing their culture into the classroom, with new rules that let boys be boys, and video games that teach as well as entertain.
author: Ali Carr-Chellman
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, bullying, children, education, gaming, psychology, technology, violence
